CustomField.description: The type of living situation the student(s) has at the primary nighttime residence.
CustomField.label: Type of Living Accommodations

value.fullName: In a temporary trailer, campground, car, or park due to the lack of alternative accommodations
value.label: In a temporary trailer, campground, car, or park due to the lack of alternative accommodations

value.fullName: With more than one family in a house or an apartment NOT due to loss of housing or economic hardship
value.label: With more than one family in a house or an apartment NOT due to loss of housing or economic hardship

value.fullName: With More Than One Family In A House, An Apartment Or Other Transitional Housing Due To Loss Of Housing Or Economic Hardship
value.label: With More Than One Family In A House, An Apartment Or Other Transitional Housing Due To Loss Of Housing Or Economic Hardship

value.fullName: In a shelter or transitional housing
value.label: In a shelter or transitional housing

value.fullName: With more than one family in a house or an apartment due to loss of housing or economic hardship
value.label: With more than one family in a house or an apartment due to loss of housing or economic hardship

value.fullName: 2+ Families In A Shared Living Situation Due To Loss Of Housing Or Economic Hardship
value.label: 2+ Families In A Shared Living Situation Due To Loss Of Housing Or Economic Hardship

value.fullName: A Primary Nighttime Residence Not Designed For Regular Sleeping Accommodations
value.label: A Primary Nighttime Residence Not Designed For Regular Sleeping Accommodations

value.fullName: A primary nighttime residence that is a public or private place not designed for or ordinarily used
value.label: A primary nighttime residence that is a public or private place not designed for or ordinarily used
